sub_title: Vice President Global Consumer Journey and Head of Marketing EMEA & AMERICAS at Tommy Hilfiger
summary:
A charismatic, high-energy executive with a consistent track record of over achieving growth targets. Aspires to lead as Chief Marketing/Digital Officer shaping a high-performance team to gain market leadership through insights driven marketing. 

Independent strategic thinker, confident in making analytical decisions and designing blueprints for success. Experienced in leading digital transformation in a complex matrix organization and building required capabilities, process and governance to accelerate growth. Creative problem solver with a hands-on approach to execution. Thrives in a fast-paced environment with a strong can-do attitude and continuously looking for ways to do better.


Areas of Expertise:

Accelerate growth - Branding & positioning - Go-to-Market strategy - Build digital capabilities
Performance marketing - Integrated campaigns - Retail partnerships - Endorsement marketing
Build winning teams - Digital transformation - LEAN and Kaizen - Connected propositions


Selected Achievements:

Record high market shares (>5% growth) for Philips Sonicare through integrated campaigns with TV, instore, digital and promotions; 68% market leadership in US (~70% of sales) and exceeding sales targets by >15% while growing electric toothbrush category from 1% to 28% 

Built new marketing capabilities and shaped high performance teams from scratch for Global H&W Marketing Team (>45), Amazon Global Account Team (>7) and Global .COM Support Team (>20) 

Developed new online retail channel transforming Amazon from a tactical account (<€30M) to a strategic marketing platform for product launches with a turnover of >€350M in less than 3 years

Lead digital transformation for Philips Product Divisions launching 50 new eCommerce enabled web sites, creating the foundation for digital marketing for business units and country organizations

Introduced Corporate Athlete program to Philips Leadership Team training people to get to higher performance through energy management

projects.title: DiamondClean Amethyst OVC
projects.description:
How to brush your teeth with the New Sonicare DiamondClean Amethyst Edition Philips HX9372

The new Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Amethyst Edition makes you stand out from the crowd. With its award-winning design, it's a toothbrush that makes you feel special. It improves your gum health and gives you white teeth for life.

Proven to improve oral health
- Removes up to 7X more plaque than a manual toothbrush
- Improves gum health in only two weeks
- Whitens teeth more than 2x better than a manual toothbrush
- Philips Sonicare toothbrush helps whiten teeth
- Sensitive Mode: Gentle teeth and gum cleaning

Provides a superior clean
- DiamondClean toothbrush head for Sonicare's best whitening
- Sonicare dynamic cleaning action drives fluid between teeth

Designed around you
- Dual Charging System: Charging glass and travel case
- Guides you to follow dental recommendations
- Two-minute timer helps ensure recommended brushing time
- Quadpacer interval timer encourages thorough brushing

authors.headline: Vice President Global Consumer Journey and Head of Marketing EMEA & AMERICAS at Tommy Hilfiger

company.name: Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management

profile_positions.company: Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management
profile_positions.description:
An immersive program experience and comprehensive learning journey over 12 months focused on:

(1) Marketing strategy (2) Innovation and growth (3) Customer centricity (4) Leadership
profile_positions.title: Executive Education - Chief Marketing Officer Program

profile_positions.description:
TOMMY HILFIGER occupies a unique position as a premium designer brand under which quality apparel, accessories and lifestyle products are offered at accessible price points. Tommy Hilfiger markets its products under several brands in order to fully capitalize on its global appeal, as each brand varies in terms of price point, demographic target and distribution. Global retail sales of products sold under the TOMMY HILFIGER brands were approximately $9.2 billion in 2019.

Leading largest regions EMEA and AMERICAS (team >120) together with Global thought leadership on marketing activation functions and capabilities. Transforming marketing to become consumer centric with a business minded approach delivering more impact in close partnership with country organizations. Reshaping process and ways of working supported with strategic guidance, performance dashboard and marketing calendar.

Globally developed an "art and science" mindset driven by a data underpinned performance framework with value as a compass.  Cultivating a "test and learn" mentality allowing for collective creative thinking while at the same time scalability of success formulas with speed.

Shaped a strategic activation framework enabling targeted messages to become more relevant with selected target audiences leveraging content library and consumer preferences. Implemented consumer behavior driven personalization of communication and content creation with double digit increase in engagement and conversion 

Developed a dedicated #whatsyourdrive social campaign for Lewis Hamilton and Mercedes AMG Formula One team with seasonal narrative resulting in over 30M views, 2.8M engagements and 2B paid media impressions

Leading omnichannel CRM and Loyalty program with  double digit increase in repeat purchase and average transaction value reshaping a more life time value approach to marketing.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Global Consumer Journey and Head of Marketing EMEA & AMERICAS

profile_positions.description:
With a turnover of close to €2B, BG Health and Wellness is the fastest growing business group within Philips and at the heart of their vision of improving people’s lives through meaningful innovation.

Developed the Philips Sonicare and Avent brand strategy turning a downward trend to an increase in brand preference. Reshaped a fragmented ecosystem to cohesive consumer experiences, based on new positioning and messaging platform to consumers and professionals

Grew consumer demand through impactful integrated campaigns (incl. TVC, digital, social and instore) from 3 to > 20 based on a model of market archetypes and aligned messaging platform driving synergies and brand consistency

Effective management of global €200M+ Advertising and Promotion budget (of which €50M centrally) coupled with governance model of pre-campaign validation and post in market impact analysis to ensure predicted business growth within profitability targets and sign off by stakeholders and CEO

Established real time digital performance dashboard to monitor content and message effectiveness allowing for testing new concepts and continuous optimization to increase marketing ROI

Built diverse global marketing team from scratch (>45) in NL, CN and US, established ways of working for 30+ markets, 3 business and corporate and integrated Marketing Intelligence and Consumer Care to build consumer insights DNA and have voice of the consumer feed marketing decisions
profile_positions.title: VP Global Marketing & Communications, Brand, eCommerce and Digital, Philips Health & Wellness

profile_positions.description:
Transformed Amazon from a tactical account (<€30M) to a top 3 global strategic retail partner (+€350M) in less than 3 years and converted into marketing platform for key product launches

Built content marketing capabilities and shaped team of 7 experts generating shopping behavior insights and optimizing consumer experience partnering with country organizations and BU’s

Reporting to SVP International Retail Board as part of EMEA Management Team
profile_positions.title: Senior Director Global Account Management Amazon, Digital Marketing and eCommerce

company.name: Product Division Domestic Appliances and Personal Care (DAP)

profile_positions.description:
Leading step up in digital launching 50 new eCommerce enabled country product web sites consumers and created Global .COM Support and Content Management Team (20)

Managing Amazon US as retail account with double digit growth

Reporting to VP Marketing EU & NA as part of Regional Management Team
profile_positions.title: Director Online Marketing & eCommerce and National Key Account Manager Amazon USA

profile_positions.description:
Lead consultant for the Philips account in charge of designing and building Philips eCommerce infrastructure to initiate strategic direct selling channel to end consumers in 12 EU countries

Program reported into Philips VP ECRM and SVP EMEA with visibility to the Board of Management
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As certified Six Sigma master black belt trained and consulted clients (Samsung, Pfizer, Shell, BP, Swiss Air, Unilever) to achieve efficiency improvement (60-70%) and cost savings (>€500M)

Global lead ISO 9000 training program for Nokia Corporation (trained >200 people) improving the quality performance control of their strategic suppliers by reducing supplier related call rates with 30%
profile_positions.title: Consultant
